For you ppl complaining about the quality of this upload think about this before you complain next time:- If people did not upload even poor quality cam copies like this we would wait a hell of a lot longer for a Decent Telesynch version in English to be released as it is this type of poor quality video copy which often provides the English audio soundtrack for someone to synch up with a better quality video from a foreign language release. If people did not upload every copy available, no matter how poor, the available material for those very clever people who make the telesynch releases which most of us watch as our 1st viewing of many films, would be a hell of a lot smaller and we would see those telesynch releases a lot later than we do and it is  thanks to people uploading material like this that we see many TS releases so soon after the film is released at the cinema.
 So next time if you cant say "thankyou" dont say anything.
